name: Pedro Jam
description:
Pedro Jam is an arcade platformer spinoff of Pedro Land.

Face waves of enemies across all of Pedro's adventures in his homeland!

Controls:
W - up/interact with NPCs, doors, etc
A and D - left and right, respectively
S - duck/down
L/Spacebar - jump
K/left click on mouse - shoot
Enter - initiate game mode, exit NPC dialogue, etc
Escape key - pause/unpause game
